---
title: "Analytical types"
---




## Substantive types

*Noun*. Objects of type `LMFNoun` have properties retreivable with the functions `lmpGender`, `lmpCase`, `lmpNumber`.

Not yet implemented:

- Pronoun
- Adjective
- Adverb

## Verbal types

*Finite verb*. Objects of type `LMFFiniteVerb` have properties retreivable with the functions `lmpPerson`, `lmpNumber`, `lmpTense`, `lmpMood`, `lmpVoice`.

Not yet implemented:

- Infinitive
- Participle
- Supine
- Gerund
- Gerundive

## Other types

- Uninflected form
